summary:
Only a merged Mod with all 4 Girls in one File
Optional Bodys: ADEC, CBBE, UNPB and 7 BASE
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/D06i913.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=Darkcyan]These are the merged Files of some of my Girl Mods, one File for all 4, with Sevenbase Body-optional UNPB Body, CBBE Body and ADEC Body.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]It was a request from InMyBestInterest.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3535793/?]InMyBestInterest[/url]


[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Lightseagreen]This is a Standalone Mod[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=Darkcyan]Locations:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/bwa3t6i.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Apollonyaa Apo-Nord Wizard/Levl.10: You find Apollonyaa in the Winterholdcollege Hall of the Elements.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qCHmMBF.jpg[/img]
[i][color=Peachpuff]Angelynaa Ang-Nord Wizard /Levl.10: You find Angelynaa Riverwood, SleepingGiantInn.[/color][/i]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qQKb01m.png[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Layyla Laa-Ench Class Dremora Melee /Levl.10: You find Layyla in Markarth in the Silver Blood Inn.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/22rrEUO.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Nathaly Nomercy-EnchClassThalmor Wizzard/Levl.12: You find Nathaly in Whiterun,Temple of Kynareth.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=Lightseagreen]Recommend:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]

[i][color=Darkcyan]XP32 Maximum Skeleton by xp32[/color][/i]

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][color=Peachpuff]YOU NEED THIS OR ELSE YOU WILL CRASH TO THE DESKTOP!!![/color][/b][/i][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][color=Lightseagreen]Does not replace anything in Game!![/color]
[/b][/i][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Darkcyan]Mods that I use for the Girls:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666//?]FemFeet by Phygit[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page by MrTroubleMaker[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5390/?]Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC now TBBP Compatible by AcDale[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21602/?]Lunari Race by bhaktisean[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes by humannature66[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28740//?]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos for UNP - UNPB by THEHAG[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160/?]Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade[/url]

Warpaints by SkyrimKnight2013

SG Hairs

Ewis Tattoo

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Thanks archimagekhan for testing.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16671834/?]archimagekhan[/url]


[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Thanks Kai for testing and Screenshooting.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2318405/?]gucky2010[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jdKB1Fe.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0DVYpFl.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/c4MMHWf.jpg[/img]
by Kai


[font=Georgia][size=4][b][i][color=Lightseagreen]Manually Installation:[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][b][i][color=Peachpuff]Copy the ESP, Meshes and Textures-Folder[/color][/i]
[i][color=Peachpuff]and paste it in your Data- Folder,[/color][/i]
[i][color=Peachpuff]and confirm to overwrite if you already[/color][/i]
[i][color=Peachpuff]have a Meshes and Textures Folder there.[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font]
